tool_description: Extracts sales transaction data for specified products and time periods to support pricing performance analysis.

product_ids.description: List of specific product IDs to extract

error_messages: Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 datetime strings.
Product not found: One or more product IDs in the list do not exist in the database.
Date range too large: Maximum allowed date range is 2 years to prevent performance issues.
usage: Specify start_date and end_date for the analysis period. Optionally provide product_ids array to filter specific products, or leave empty to extract all products.

total_records.description: Total number of sales records extracted

total_revenue.description: Sum of all sales revenue in the period

unique_products.description: Number of unique products in the dataset

date_range_actual.description: Actual date range of extracted data
